name: Congee
instructions: 1. Rinse the rice. 2. In a pot, combine rice and water/broth. 3. Bring to a boil, then simmer. 4. Add minced ginger and cook until rice is soft. 5. Season with soy sauce and top with green onions and a drizzle of sesame oil.

name: Dim Sum Buns
instructions: 1. Mix flour, water, sugar, and yeast. 2. Knead into a dough, then let it rise. 3. Roll dough into small circles. 4. Fill with seasoned ground pork or shrimp. 5. Steam for 15-20 minutes. 6. Serve with soy sauce and a drizzle of sesame oil.

name: Kimchi Pancakes
instructions: 1. Mix flour, chopped kimchi, kimchi juice, and green onions. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Spoon batter into the pan, cook until golden. 4. Flip and cook the other side. 5. Serve with soy sauce and a drizzle of sesame oil.

name: Idli
instructions: 1. Soak rice, dal, and fenugreek seeds. 2. Grind into a batter. 3. Add salt and let it ferment. 4. Pour batter into idli molds. 5. Steam for 10-15 minutes. 6. Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Roti Canai
instructions: 1. Mix flour, water, and condensed milk into a dough. 2. Divide into balls, coat with ghee. 3. Flatten and stretch dough. 4. Cook on a hot griddle until golden. 5. Serve with curry sauce and dhal curry.

name: Pho Bo
instructions: 1. Cook rice noodles. 2. Heat beef broth. 3. Arrange noodles and beef in a bowl. 4. Pour hot broth over. 5. Top with bean sprouts, basil, lime, and sriracha.
